code: export default function FormField(data){this.uid=data.uid;this.label=data.label;this.type=data.data_type;this.defaultValue=data.value;this.metadata=data._metadata;var _ref=this.metadata||{},required=_ref.required;if(required){this.label="".concat(data.label,"*");this.metadata["errorMessage"]="".concat(data.label," is required field!");}}
